channel.title: [317] iPlay 317 [Delta]
channel.description:
iPlay 317 Starting a Development Team
iPlay 317
Base: Delta
Hey, i'm Greg.
About iPlay 317 We are a small group of people, looking for a start. We have been wanting to take off for a while now, after planning too many ideas, we finally are starting up. We have goals, way points to meet up to. We have always wanted a well player earned server. Skills, runecrafting, smithing, thieving and so on. We want skills like these, skills that generate the economy to be the foundation of our server. Greg and I are completely dedicated on making this server what we have been hoping for. We have spent many hours working on a good format for a website, gathering suggestions, making a to-do list, and more. We are just struggling with getting help, not too easy to do all this alone. If you think you may be able to help, read on.
What we are looking for We are looking for a few extra developers to join our team. We are creating this from a blank. We aren't the most experienced with this, so we require a little assistance.
NOTE: It would help incredibly if you had a mic and owned either Skype or Ventrilo.
Whether your somewhat experienced or super experienced, if you think you could make a useful addition to our development team we will be glad to find a spot for you on our development team, so if you can help in any way, send us a Email/Message via MSN.
What we specifically need is, - A Source Developer - A Client Developer ________________________________________ Lead in Project - Greg_iPlay317@live.com ________________________________________ _Application_
Age:
Name:
Do you have a Mic:
What can you do to help us:
Do you have any specialties:
What type of RSPS Experience do you have: ________________________________________
If you have any questions before you want to contact us, feel free to ask them here. I would be more than happy to respond!

item.title: [317] iPlay 317 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @ipwnurgfsass ipwnurgfsass
item.description:
@ipwnurgfsass wrote:

Age: 15

Name: Allen

Do you have a Mic: Yes

What can you do to help us: Source code, help with the community, basic client coding

Do you have any specialties: Adding game content like skills(fletching, mining, etc.) and minigames

What type of RSPS Experience do you have: about a year coding, mostly 317

Contact me on MSN: eminem2458@live.com
I’m on it almost all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] iPlay 317 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Age: 13

Name: Justin (Last name shan't be said :P)

Do you have a Mic: Nope :/ MSN though.

What can you do to help us: I've been coding for quite a while now, I'm in the process of making my own base. I decided I was going to help someone else out for a bit though.

Do you have any specialties: Cache Editing & Source Editing. (I'm not the best with the client, though i know the basics.)

What type of RSPS Experience do you have: Coding? :P Lots of experience.

MSN: Justin.persinger@gmail.com (Heh, oh well on the whole last name thing.)

Read full topic

item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

[quote=“Nameme123, post:2, topic:352453”] Age: I prefer not to say unless really nedded.

Name: Ben

Do you have a Mic: Not on my main computer but on my laptop I do but that's broken... So my only chance is Micrsoft Sam :P

What can you do to help us: Make you a website, make a server, help with the coding and more!

Do you have any specialties: I can do both of those things you listed. I can also make a server and make a website for you guys if you need it. I'm a HTML coder also and there is so much more to share!

What type of RSPS Experience do you have: Made many Private Server of all different versions but mostly 317.[/quote]

haha i have been messaging you on mopar lol get on msn so we can talk already have you added
